text: "I think the shuttering of Fox 2000 is going to go down as the one big mistake The Mouse has made in an otherwise flawless strategy," said Marty Bowen, producer of Fox 2000 titles like 'Fault in Our Stars' and 'Love, Simon.'
author: Erik_Hayden

text: What a day at Fox: All three Fox film marketing chiefs are out as Disney reorganization begins, @PamelaDayM reports
author: Erik_Hayden

text: Writers Guild West president's response to the UTA study: "This is a false premise. There is no way to compare what writers would make in a world with agency packaging and without agency packaging."
author: Erik_Hayden

text: UTA, in an effort to counter Writers Guild claims, reveals an in-house data set aiming to prove that writers make more on packaged shows
author: Erik_Hayden

text: 80 years later, 'Gone With the Wind' is still grossing millions in theaters
author: Erik_Hayden

text: New L.A. Times owner: "We will be the last man standing when it comes to print"
author: Erik_Hayden

text: 12 days after @TatianaSiegel27 and @kimmasters' story about Tsujihara and Kirk is published, the Warner Bros. CEO steps down
author: Erik_Hayden

text: As the Writers Guild meets with agency reps today, its new report concludes: "WME, CAA, and their private equity owners will have to choose between operating as talent agencies, and expanding their businesses into content production and ownership." https://www.wga.org/uploadedfiles/members/member_info/agency_agreement/Agencies_for_Sale_WGA_31819.pdf …
author: Erik_Hayden
